title: Coinbase Paves Way for Big Institutions to Do More With Web3, DeFi, NFTs
description: Coinbase, best-known for being one of the largest crypto exchanges for retail customers, continued its expansion into the professional space with the introduction Tuesday of a Web3 wallet designed to help institutions get into NFTs and other corners of decentralized finance, or DeFi.

title: Sony subsidiary and Starlate join forces to build new blockchain for global Web3 infrastructure
description:
Sony Network Communications, a subsidiary of the Japanese conglomerate, has announced a partnership with Starlate Labs to develop a new blockchain network, according to a Sept. 12 press statement shared with CryptoSlate. The two companies entered into a joint venture agreement for the purpose, and the goal is to make the new blockchain the backbone […]

The post Sony subsidiary and Starlate join forces to build new blockchain for global Web3 infrastructure appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: CoinEx Exchange Hacked for Over $30 Million
description: CoinEx's hot wallets have been drained of over $30 million in ETH, TRON, and Polygon's MATIC.

title: Visa Publishes Research Exploring Solana's Blockchain Capabilities
description: Wijeyekoon and Bedawala claim that Solana's capability for parallel transaction processing is notable because in contrast to Ethereum (which uses a single-threaded model), Solana's architecture is designed to process multiple transactions simultaneously.

title: IMF Publications’ Report Highlights Growing Risks of Generative AI in Financial Sector
description: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues its expansion into the finance sector, a new report published on the International Monetary Fund (IMF) Publications web portal cautions about risks associated with the latest AI capabilities in the financial world. The Rise of Thinking Machines: Report Warns of Risks From Generative AI in Finance The report, authored by […]

title: Innovative Research to Enhance Lung Cancer Treatment
description: In a remarkable initiative, The Christie NHS Foundation Trust in Manchester has secured a substantial £2.3 million grant from the National Institute for Health Research (NIHR). This funding will support an ambitious research project known as the RAPID-RT study. The primary goal of this groundbreaking endeavor is to facilitate the risk of heart damage in ... Read more

title: Call of Duty’s Multiplayer Revolution: Transforming Gaming into a Global Community
description: In recent years, the landscape of the gaming world has undergone a profound transformation, leaving behind the solitary gaming experiences of yesteryears. Gone are the days when players would sit isolated in their rooms, fully engrossed in virtual worlds. The catalyst for this shift is undeniably the rise of online multiplayer gaming, and at the ... title: Generative AI Beyond the “Wow” Effect in UnlockingTangible Results
description: In the realm of Silicon Valley’s tech discussions, the spotlight has been firmly fixed on Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI). This technology has dazzled us with its human-like ability to draw inferences through the use of Large Language Models (LLMs). title: Crypto hackers shift additional $328M in stolen funds- Reports
description: In a continuing saga of cryptocurrency thefts and exploits, hackers responsible for the $41 million hack of cryptocurrency casino Stake have managed to shift an additional $328 million worth of assets, according to blockchain security firm CertiK. This latest development follows the initial exploit that occurred on September 4, which resulted in the theft of ... Read more

title: Tencent Cloud joins forces with Ankr to revolutionize blockchain access
description: Tencent Cloud has partnered with Ankr, a leading decentralized blockchain infrastructure provider, to launch Tencent Cloud Blockchain RPC. This Web3-native product aims to provide organizations and enterprises with more efficient and robust access to blockchain infrastructure. The service, now available on Tencent Cloud’s online marketplace, offers an instant portal to key blockchain networks like Ethereum ... Read more

title: Banana Gun’s redemption plan after BANANA token crash
description: The much-anticipated launch of Banana Gun's BANANA token faced a catastrophic glitch, causing a drastic price drop shortly after its debut. Amidst accusations and chaos, the team is working on a recovery plan.
